content.text:
# Talking to You (Izzy Bizu song)

}}
"Talking to You" is a 2016 song by English soul singer Izzy Bizu from her debut album A Moment of Madness. To date, it is her highest charting single in the UK and Scotland.
Charts
{| class="wikitable"
!Chart
!Peakposition
|-
|Scotland
|17
|-
|United Kingdom
|56
|}
